title: Levels of anti-Mullerian hormone may help predict bone loss during menopause transition
description: Physicians may be able to determine if menopause-related bone loss is already in progress or about to begin by measuring the level of a hormone that declines as women approach their final menstrual period, new UCLA research finds.
content:

title: Large Study Challenges Theory that Light Alcohol Consumption Benefits Heart Health
description: Any observed benefit likely results from other lifestyle factors common among light to moderate drinkers, say researchers.
content: April 4, 2022 – Observational research has suggested that light alcohol consumption may provide heart-related health benefits, but in a large study published in JAMA Network Open, alcohol intake at all levels was linked with higher risks of cardiovas... [4011 chars]

title: Covid: Study finds the virus can result in neuron death or severe brain inflammation
description: WHILE the long-term complications of a Covid infection are well-documented, there's still much unknown about them. Experts keep researching the link as well as possible treatments. As neurological complications can be 'the most severe and persistent', a new study shows their relationship with Covid in 'detail'.

title: Coronavirus New Symptoms: 9 New Signs Added to COVID Symptoms List. Watch Out For Them
description: Fever, cough or loss of sense of smell or taste were settled on, because they were either present in most COVID cases or almost exclusively caused by the virus.
content: New Delhi: Another nine signs of a coronavirus infection have been added to the official list of COVID-19 symptoms, reported BBC. The UK Health Security Agency’s updated guidance now lists symptoms including a sore throat, muscle pains and diarrhoea ... [1427 chars]

title: Loss of neurons, not lack of sleep, makes Alzheimer’s patients drowsy - study
description: The findings contradict the common belief that Alzheimer’s disease patients sleep during the day to make up for a bad night of sleep.
content:
The tiredness that Alzheimer’s patients experience is not caused by a lack of sleep, but the system in their brain that keeps them awake no longer works, a new study suggests.

title: Causes and cures for iron deficiency in Indian women
description: If you notice that you’re tired, fall sick more often, have frequent headaches with dizziness, and appear pale, you may have anaemia. This is a rising problem in women’s health, especially in India, where nearly 53 per cent of women between the ages of 15 and 50 years have anaemia. The most common reason behind anaemia is the deficiency of either iron or vitamin b12 and folic
